version_description:
We've been requested to localise Ridiculous Fishing, so we did! This update is a minor update and introduces only International Version Support. Ridiculous Fishing now support French, Italian, German, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese. For English users, nothing has changed beyond that the game will now be hard to understand if you switch your device to another language.

We're still working on an update scheduled somewhere in 2014. Happy new year and see you in 2014!

This minor update brings mostly bugfixes, solving problems occurring on a small number of devices.

Thanks so much for all the support on social networks and for your enthusiasm. The messages that we've been receiving from players are heartwarming.

- Rami, J.W., Zach, Greg and Eirik

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

This compatibility update of Ridiculous Fishing brings support for new iOS devices and functionality. Two brand-new speedrun leaderboards to fish fast for, and haptic feedback support for devices that support it.
